name: Advanced Pediatric Life Support Certification
description: This badge certifies specialized training in managing life-threatening pediatric emergencies, including respiratory failure, shock, and cardiac arrest in children and infants. The recipient has demonstrated proficiency in age-specific assessment, advanced airway techniques, fluid resuscitation, and pharmacological interventions for critically ill pediatric patients.

criteria.narrative: Successfully completed: 1) Pediatric assessment triangle 2) Age-specific resuscitation protocols 3) Management of respiratory distress/failure 4) Shock recognition and treatment 5) Pediatric toxicology 6) Trauma stabilization 7) Family-centered care during emergencies

alignment.targetName: American Academy of Pediatrics APLS Guidelines
alignment.targetDescription: Meets AAP standards for pediatric emergency care
Aligns with national pediatric emergency protocols
